name: Nuclear Rain
description:
Upgrade your weapons into world-ending computer-crashing machines in this fast-paced movement shooter

shoot things, go fast, don't die.

Pickup perks to upgrade your weapons, shoot faster, shoot more, get crazy combos and modifiers.  every run is unique with random weapons, perks, and more available each time

Will you survive long enough to reach the boss?

Note: Health items are currently impossible to pickup due to a corrupted packet
